TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlHead extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlHead Inherits HtmlGenericControl

summary.span: 可讓您以程式設計方式存取伺服端程式碼中的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element in server code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML`head`元素是可包含其他頁面的相關資訊的容器。The HTML `head` element is a container that can contain additional information about the page. 控制項適用於指定的格式設定資訊可在執行階段存取的頁面。The control is useful for specifying page formatting information that can be accessed at run time. > [!NOTE] > 不支援非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式將樣式或樣式規則。Adding styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式存取控制項，以動態方式加入`title`和`style`項目`head`頁面項目。The following example shows how to programmatically access the control to dynamically add `title` and `style` elements to the `head` element of the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/CS/htmlheadclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/VB/htmlheadclassvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 執行個體，表示 控制項中的樣式規則。

span.span: Gets an instance that represents the style rules in the control.

value.span: 物件，表示 控制項中的樣式規則。

span.span: An object that represents the style rules in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回表示中的內嵌的樣式規則控制項。The property returns an that represents the embedded style rules in the control. > [!NOTE] > 不支援非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式將樣式或樣式規則。Adding styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入內嵌的樣式規則的 html`body`項目。The following example shows how to programmatically add an embedded style rule for the HTML `body` element. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/CS/htmlheadclasscs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/VB/htmlheadclassvb.aspx#2)]
